Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue/Narragansett
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Oak Park, Grand, Austin and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Oak Park, Grand, Austin and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Narragansett.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (O'Hare)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (O'Hare) due to a sick passenger on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (O'Hare) due to a sick passenger on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
